label: Bathroom Accessories
description: Products and items used to decorate and organize a bathroom.
intents: Find accessories to decorate my bathroom.
Replace or upgrade my current bathroom accessories.

subcategories.label: Shower Accessories
subcategories.description: Accessories used in the shower or bath.

subcategories.label: Toilet Accessories
subcategories.description: Accessories used in or around the toilet.

subcategories.label: Bath Mats
subcategories.description: Mats used in the bathroom, particularly around the bath or shower.

subcategories.label: Soap and Toothbrush Holders
subcategories.description: Accessories used to hold soap and toothbrushes.

subcategories.label: Other Accessories
subcategories.description: Other bathroom accessories not covered in the previous subcategories.
